amendment.description: To protect children from violent programming.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3466 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3466 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Hollings to Amendment SA 3235. (consideration: CR S7130) To protect children from violent programming.
